titlealts.searchtitle: (): Groups in the RPM or DEB

concept.shortdesc: These groups are created for the purpose of loading master keys.

conbody.p:
They are added during RPM or DEB installation as updates to /etc/groups. See .
cca_admin
cca_clrmk
cca_lfmkp
cca_cmkp
cca_setmk
